definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ge 40:11 grape(s) (on formation cf. Lag:BN 153);—´[[ע]] abs. De 32:14 (coll.); elsewhere pl. [[עֲנׇבִים]] Ge 40:10 +; cstr. [[עִנְּכֵי]] (Ges:§ 20 h) Le 25:5, De 32:32; sf. [[עֲנׇבֵמוֹ]] v:De 32:32; —grapes Ge 10:40, Ge 40:11 (E), Am 9:13 (all as yielding juice for drink), Ho 9:10 (sim.), Is 5:2, Is 5:4 (parable), Je 8:13, Ne 13:15, Le 25:5 (H); ´[[מִשְׁרַת ע]] Nu 6:3 (P), poet. ´[[דַּם־ע]] Ge 49:11, De 32:14; ´[[בִּכּוּרֵי ע]] Nu 13:20, ´[[אֶשְׁכּוֹל ע]] v:Nu 13:23 (JE); eaten De 23:25, so [[לַתִים וִיבֵשִׁים]] ´[[ע]] Nu 6:3; ´[[אֲשִׁישֵׁי ע]] Ho 3:1 raisen-cakes; [[רוֹשׁ]] ´[[ע]] De 32:32 grapes of poison.
